profile.name: Berta
profile.title: Innovation engineer | Masters Big Data Analytics
profile.description:
Currently, I am part of the innovation team at Kenmei Technologies, working as a Data Scientist and implementing solutions to optimize DataOps workflows.

Previously, after completing my Master's degree in Civil Engineering, I worked for over three years as a transportation engineer and data scientist at CPS Infraestructuras, Movilidad y Medio Ambiente, conducting modeling, traffic, and mobility studies. During this period, I was able to implement new ways of working and develop new products (web requests, ETL processes, visualization, cloud...) focused on obtaining and exploiting new mobility data sources.

Regarding my personal projects, I highlight that my continuous work in data analysis and my interests in statistics and programming led me to self-train in both data analysis and the Python programming language. These interests led me to continue my education until I completed a Master's degree in Big Data Analytics, where I learned to manage large volumes of data efficiently, as reflected in my final master's project "Analysis and visualization of the impact of music festivals on Blablacar trips," which also won the second prize nationally in the Datathon Cajamar University Hack.

location.notes: Autocompleted using Google Maps API (id: ChIJb7Dv8ExPYA0ROR1_HwFRo7Q)

challenges.description:
As a Team Leader, I am dedicated to fostering a collaborative and high-performing environment within the team by developing the following functions:
‚óè Responsible for establishing and leading all required Scrum sessions, ensuring alignment with Scrum methodology and promoting team productivity.
‚óè Serve as a bond, effectively communicating challenges and blockers faced by the innovation team to leadership and ensuring transparency across teams.
‚óè Collaborate with other teams to ensure that product development aligns with requirements and delivers incremental improvements.
‚óè Participate in industry events, such as the Mobile World Congress, to stay informed on the latest trends and innovations while fostering professional connections.

In my capacity as a Developer, I actively participate in the following projects:
‚óè Developed time series forecasting models using Scikit-Learn algorithms for anomaly detection and energy-saving maximization, optimizing operational efficiency and resource allocation.
‚óè Designed custom solutions focused on optimizing performance, identifying ideal locations, and discovering best-fit strategies to meet specific project needs using existing cloud solutions (GCP and Azure).
‚óè Built data summary dashboards in Looker, leveraging data stored in BigQuery to provide actionable insights and enhance decision-making processes.
‚óè Set up ETL workflows in both Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and Azure, streamlining data processing and ensuring reliable data availability across platforms.
‚óè Developed a multi-agent chatbot service using OpenAI‚Äôs language models, specializing in consulting telecom solutions and providing expert guidance tailored to sector-specific challenges.

As Innovation Engineer, I work in:
‚óè Developed innovative solutions for users of 4G and 5G technologies using processed data stored in a data lake, with implementation in Python to enhance connectivity and user experience.
‚óè Conducted comprehensive churn analysis to identify patterns and improve customer retention strategies, utilizing data manipulation libraries such as Pandas and NumPy, as well as machine learning libraries like Scikit-Learn, XGBoost, and LightGBM.
‚óè Established and implemented a robust MLOps environment to streamline machine learning workflows, incorporating monitoring tools to evaluate innovative solutions and develop dashboards using Grafana for real-time insights.

studies.name: Master - Big Data Analytics, Information technology

manfredSpecificData.desiredJobDescription: Data scientist in a mobility company
manfredSpecificData.goodPractices:
As a Civil Engineer, diving into technical best practices was one of the most mind-bended and knotted universe to discover when I started learning Big Data.
As a developer, I love cleanliness and simplicity.
As tech enthusiastic, it have been difficult to find a project where TDD was a priority, so I have started to include it in my side projects.
